<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>@charset "UTF-8";

/*!
 * animate.css -https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/
 * Version - 3.7.2
 * Licensed under the MIT license - http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
 *
 * Copyright (c) 2019 Daniel Eden
 */

@-webkit-keyframes bounce {
  from,
  20%,
  53%,
  80%,
  to {
    -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  }

  40%,
  43% {
    -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -30px, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, -30px, 0);
  }

  70% {
    -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -15px, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, -15px, 0);
  }

  90% {
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -4px, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, -4px, 0);
  }
}

@keyframes bounce {
  from,
  20%,
  53%,
  80%,
  to {
    -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.61, 0.355, 1);
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, 0, 0);
  }

  40%,
  43% {
    -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -30px, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, -30px, 0);
  }

  70% {
    -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.05, 0.855, 0.06);
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -15px, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, -15px, 0);
  }

  90% {
    -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -4px, 0);
    transform: translate3d(0, -4px, 0);
  }
}

.bounce {
  -webkit-animation-name: bounce;
  animation-name: bounce;
  -webkit-transform-origin: center bottom;
  transform-origin: center bottom;
}

@-webkit-keyframes flash {
  from,
  50%,
  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }

  25%,
  75% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

@keyframes flash {
  from,
  50%,
  to {
    opacity: 1;
  }

  25%,
  75% {
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

.flash {
  -webkit-animation-name: flash;
  animation-name: flash;
}

/* originally authored by Nick Pettit - https://github.com/nickpettit/glide */

@-webkit-keyframes pulse {
  from {
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
  }

  50% {
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1.05, 1.05, 1.05);
    transform: scale3d(1.05, 1.05, 1.05);
  }

  to {
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
  }
}

@keyframes pulse {
  from {
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
  }

  50% {
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1.05, 1.05, 1.05);
    transform: scale3d(1.05, 1.05, 1.05);
  }

  to {
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
  }
}

.pulse {
  -webkit-animation-name: pulse;
  animation-name: pulse;
}

@-webkit-keyframes rubberBand {
  from {
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
    transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1);
  }

  30% {
    -webkit-transform: scale3d(1.25, 0.75, 1);
    transform: scale3d(1.25, 0.75, 1);

.animated {

}

  animation-iteration-count: infinite;
}

  animation-delay: 1s;
}

  animation-delay: 2s;
}

  animation-delay: 3s;
}

.animated.delay-4s {
  -webkit-animation-delay: 4s;
  animation-delay: 4s;
}

.animated.delay-5s {
  -webkit-animation-delay: 5s;
  animation-delay: 5s;
}

.animated.fast {
  -webkit-animation-duration: 800ms;
  animation-duration: 800ms;
}

.animated.faster {
  -webkit-animation-duration: 500ms;
  animation-duration: 500ms;
}

.animated.slow {
  -webkit-animation-duration: 2s;
  animation-duration: 2s;
}

.animated.slower {
  -webkit-animation-duration: 3s;
  animation-duration: 3s;
}

@media (print), (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {

    -webkit-animation-duration: 1ms !important;
    animation-duration: 1ms !important;

    -webkit-animation-iteration-count: 1 !important;

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e038aaabdb25cc10d033df8b4b9619a5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_pisn_sp_ctx_view.SpTaskContextViewAPI</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SpTaskContextViewAPI</name><script><![CDATA[var SpTaskContextViewAPI = Class.create();
SpTaskContextViewAPI.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},


    getViews: function() {
        var views = [];
        var grViews = new GlideRecord("x_pisn_sp_ctx_view_sp_context_view");
        grViews.addQuery("active=true");
        grViews.orderBy("order");
        grViews.query();
        while (grViews.next()) {
            var states = this.__getStates(grViews.getUniqueValue());
            views.push({
                sys_id: grViews.getUniqueValue(),
                table_sys_id: grViews.getValue("task_type"),
                table: grViews.getDisplayValue("task_type.name"),
                filter: grViews.getDisplayValue("filter"),
                widget_view: grViews.getDisplayValue("widget_view.id"),
                widget_options: JSON.parse(grViews.getValue("widget_options")),
                states: states
            });
        }

        return views;
    },

    getTasks: function(table, filter, maximum_entries, order_by, order_direction, field_list) {
        var tasks = [];

        var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
        gr.addQuery(filter);
        if (maximum_entries) gr.setLimit(maximum_entries);
        if (
            order_by &&
            order_direction &&
            order_direction == "desc"
        ) {
            gr.orderByDesc(order_by);
        } else if (
            order_by &&
            order_direction &&
            order_direction != "desc"
        ) {
            gr.orderBy(order_by);
        }

        if (!field_list) {
            field_list = "short_description,number,state";
        }

        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            var task = {};
            task.display_name = gr.getDisplayValue(gr.getDisplayName());
            task.fields = $sp.getFields(gr, field_list);
            task.sys_id = gr.getUniqueValue();
            task.number = gr.getValue("number");
            task.sys_updated_on = gr.getDisplayValue("sys_updated_on");
            task.state_value = gr.getValue("state");
            task.sys_class_name = gr.getValue("sys_class_name");
            task.sys_class_name_dv = gr.getDisplayValue("sys_class_name");
            task.query = gr.getEncodedQuery();

            tasks.push(task);
        }
        return tasks;
    },

    getTaskView: function(task, dataViews) {
        var view = {};

        var viewsArray = this.__clone(dataViews);
        var viewsFilter = viewsArray.filter(function(el) {
            return el.table == task.sys_class_name && el.filter.length > 0;
        });
        var viewsNoFilter = viewsArray.filter(function(el) {
            return el.table == task.sys_class_name && el.filter.length == 0;
        });

        var views = viewsFilter.concat(viewsNoFilter);

        if (views.length > 0) {
            for (var i = 0; i < views.length; i++) {
                var grAggr = new GlideAggregate(views[i].table);
                var filter = "sys_id=" + task.sys_id + "^" + views[i].filter;
                grAggr.addQuery(filter);
                grAggr.addAggregate("COUNT");
                grAggr.query();
                var count = 0;
                if (grAggr.next()) count = grAggr.getAggregate("COUNT");
                if (count > 0) {
                    view = {};
                    view = views[i];
                    view.widget_options.sys_id = task.sys_id;
                    view.widget_options.table = task.sys_class_name;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }

        return view;
    },

    __getStates: function(viewSysId) {
        var states = {};
        var grStates = new GlideRecord("x_pisn_sp_ctx_view_sp_contextual_states");
        grStates.addQuery("sp_context_view", viewSysId);
        grStates.query();
        while (grStates.next()) {
            states[grStates.getValue("state").toString()] = grStates.getValue(
                "contextual_state"
            );
        }
        return states;

    },

    __clone: function(obj) {
        var newObj = obj instanceof Array ? [] : {};
        for (var prop in obj) {
            if (typeof obj[prop] === "object") {
                newObj[prop] = this.__clone(obj[prop]);
            } else {
                newObj[prop] = obj[prop];
            }
        }
        return newObj;
    },

    type: 'SpTaskContextViewAPI'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>fabio</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-12-12 09:46:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>e038aaabdb25cc10d033df8b4b9619a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SpTaskContextViewAPI</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SP Task Context View" source="x_pisn_sp_ctx_view">50e4b33edb898c10d033df8b4b9619f8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SP Task Context View">50e4b33edb898c10d033df8b4b9619f8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e038aaabdb25cc10d033df8b4b9619a5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>fabio</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-12-12 10:44:33</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
